title: Real Outlaws of the Wild West
description: The daring outlaws of the Wild West are just as fascinating to us today as they were in the late 1800s. Real Outlaws of the Wild West is an informational book that describes these notorious robbers and the crimes they committed. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships and the proper use of dashes in writing.
